Kio is not a standalone device. It's the opening shot of a much bigger Karnataka playbook. On the eve of the Bangalore Tech Summit, also known as BTS 2025, Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar announced that Karnataka is building a brand new IT city in Biri with delegations from 60 countries lining up to invest billions into Bengaluru's next expansion zone. The upcoming Greater Bengaluru Integrated Township GBIT on the Bengaluru Mysuru Expressway is being pitched as the next global technology hub powered by the same talent, hardware and innovation ecosystem that Kio is designed to democratize. This is clearly Katica scaling both sides of the equation. AI ready devices at the bottom and a brand new IT mega city at the top.
